title: Postal voting registration for officials, voters in custody open till Dec 25
body: The Election Commission has announced that voters assigned to election duty, government officials posted outside their home constituencies, and individuals in legal custody can apply for postal voting through the 'Postal Vote BD' app until December 25. The registration process will begin from the day the election schedule is announced, according to a PID press release today. Voters seeking additional information have been requested to visit the EC's official website at ecs.gov.bd.
